name: Sepia House Simulator!
description:
Explore a cute little sepia-colored house! In this pixelated game, you can enjoy your very own two-room house. ...If things start changing, it's probably just a glitch... Right?

[This is a horror-themed game! Explore a small pixelated house where things quickly go awry.]

Controls: Use "WASD" to move, "E" to interact, "Q" to scroll through text, and "Esc" to pause.>

WARNING: Has intentionally scary themes. Some flashing lights and sudden sound effects are used.

Created By: Alaina Klaes. All art, music, sound effects, and content are original assets by Alaina Klaes.
